about_the_game:
DEEP SPACE SCOUT SHIP HYPER-5 RESPONDS TO AN UNKNOWN DISTRESS BEACON.
A TERRIFYING ENEMY AWAITS.

Hyper-5 is a cinematic shmup inspired by classics from the “golden era” of the 90’s. Responding to a distress beacon, deep space scout ship Hyper-5 is drawn into a terrifying battle with an unknown enemy. Will Hyper-5 survive its encounter on planet 4GDT?

Download the FREE DEMO of Hyper-5 today and play the first three levels of the game! Enable Steam Cloud to allow progress made in the demo to transfer to the full game, including unlocking of achievements!

Download the FREE DEMO of Hyper-5 today and play the first three levels of the game! Enable Steam Cloud to allow progress made in the demo to transfer to the full game, including unlocking of achievements!
name: Hyper-5 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050Ti (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Sufficient for 720p
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-6700HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1070 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Sufficient for 1080p
